page.title: 17NESTON PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: What else can I see? Ahaaa! That's a good game those children are playing in the corner.It's called 3 Bad Eggs. No it isn't a bad smell, it is actually a game using a ball.What you have to do is choose one person to be on and the rest of you line up against the wall.The person who is on, whom we shall call A, chooses a subject.Let's say our subject is 'trees'.The people by the wall have to choose a name of a tree and also choose one for A.One person shouts them out and A has to pick one.Say there was fir, beech, oak and elm and he picked elm.He would shout it out and throw the ball up in the air.Whoever is elm catches the ball and shouts stop.Then he takes three strides and has to throw the ball at someone.If he hits that person he is alright but if he misses he gets one bad egg. P.T.O.
